name: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6 R
overview: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6 R (also known as Maximum Tune 6 R, or simply Maxi 6 R) is an arcade racing video game developed and published by Namco and based on the Wangan Midnight manga. It is the eleventh game in the Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune arcade game series. It is the first upgrade of the Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 6 arcade series and this version was launched in January 21, 2020 in Japan.
